name: stock_news
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool real_time_finance_data.
Tool description: Get stocks / market quotes and trends, ETF, international exchanges / forex, crypto,  related news and analytics in real-time.
API description: Get the latest news related to a specific stock.  Supports all stock types: *stock*, *index*, *mutual fund* and *futures*.

symbol.description: The stock symbol or ticker for which to fetch news. Examples include 'MSFT:NASDAQ', 'MSFT', '^DJI', and 'VTSAX'.

language.description:
The language to use for the results, specified as a 2-letter language code - see [ISO 639-1](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_ISO_639-1_codes).

**Default**: *en*.
